name: BlackBerry Encrypted Media
summary: An REM file is an encrypted file created by a BlackBerry smartphone . Most often, REM files contain a photo a user took with their phone. These REM files use the compound extension .jpg.rem . Other REM files may contain audio, video, or a backup of a user's BlackBerry Messenger messages or contacts.
